page.title: 19JODRELL BANK VISITOR CENTRE
page.content:
Jodrell Bank is visited each year by about 100,000 people.
Visitors can see an exhibition of explanatory diagrams, photographs and working models which describe the techniques used and the results obtained by radio and optical astronomers.
There is a Planetarium where images of stars and planets are projected onto the domed ceiling while a commentary is given.
In the grounds there is an Arboretum, with 30 acres planted with a wide variety of trees and shrubs open to the public.
